title: Game-Based Vocabulary Acquisition Program for Learners with Dyslexia

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Gamified acquisition of specialized vocabulary required for math-integrated project-based learning

learning_goals: Learners accurately acquire 55 mathematics-related specialized vocabulary items within one week
Learners perform spaced repetition at least three times per week using game-based learning tools
Learners apply vocabulary acquired from project assignments with 80% or higher accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
